name: Mithileysh
body:
### Welcome to My Page.
Mithileysh is a motivated, committed and an adaptable researcher with professional and technical skills developed through past work experiences in the computer science research field. He has a methodical, analytical-focused approach to work and a strong drive to see things through to completion.

His research focuses on Visualisation, Human-computer Interaction and Social Informatics. 

### Contact
Mithileysh Sathiyanarayanan B.E, M.Res (UK), (PhD)
Research Scientist
Red Sift Research and City, University of London
S.Mithileysh@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
